WorkItem.Description:
Implementation of CompressFilter Attribute fails to take into account an Accept-Encoding header like "gzip;q=0" - gzip content would still be served.

See the following URL for full details:
http://www.singular.co.nz/blog/archive/2008/07/06/finding-preferred-accept-encoding-header-in-csharp.aspx
WorkItem.Summary: CompressFilter Attribute incorrectly handles Accept Encodings for determining encoding
